lexUnit.name: admiration.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: positive response (emotional or spoken) to the good qualities of someone or something

sentence.text: It is one thing to win the support of electors by defeating an enemy for the first time ; it is quite another to expect admiration for slaying the same dragon twice .
